Ingredients.1: 1 (14.5 ounce) package tortilla chips, or to taste

Ingredients.3: 0.5 pounds large peeled and deveined cooked shrimp, tails removed and shrimp quartered

Ingredients.5: 4  chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, chopped

Ingredients.7: 0.25 cup dried minced onion (such as McCormick® Coarse Grind Blend White and Green Onions)

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.

Directions.2: Spread tortilla chips onto the prepared baking sheet.

Directions.3: Mix Monterey Jack cheese, shrimp, mayonnaise, chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, cilantro, minced onion, cumin, and black pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture onto the tortilla chips.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven for 3 minutes. Turn on the broiler and broil nachos until lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes. Allow nachos to sit at room temperature for about 2 minutes before serving.
